============================================
core/specify/pathpulse_3
============================================

module foo;
    specify
        specparam PATHPULSE$clk$q = (0.5,1),
                  PATHPULSE$ = (0.5);
    endspecify
endmodule

----

(source_file
  (module_declaration
    (module_ansi_header
      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier))
    (specify_block
      (specify_item
        (specparam_declaration
          (list_of_specparam_assignments
            (specparam_assignment
              (pulse_control_specparam
                (reject_limit_value
                  (constant_mintypmax_expression
                    (constant_expression
                      (constant_primary
                        (primary_literal
                          (real_number
                            (fixed_point_number)))))))
                (error_limit_value
                  (constant_mintypmax_expression
                    (constant_expression
                      (constant_primary
                        (primary_literal
                          (integral_number
                            (decimal_number
                              (unsigned_number))))))))))
            (specparam_assignment
              (pulse_control_specparam
                (reject_limit_value
                  (constant_mintypmax_expression
                    (constant_expression
                      (constant_primary
                        (primary_literal
                          (real_number
                            (fixed_point_number)))))))))))))))
